column3: For the year ended December 31, 2012, consolidated net income of $1,782 million includes $2 million attributable to preferred shareholders of subsidiaries. Income attributable to preferred shareholders of subsidiaries is not a component of total equity and is excluded from the table above.
Net of insignificant tax expense in 2014, $17 million tax expense in 2013 and $9 million tax expense in 2012. See Note 21 for additional information.
Net of $13 million tax benefit in 2014, $20 million tax expense in 2013 and $6 million tax expense in 2012.

Net of $16 million tax expense in 2012.
